targets.query: SELECT (difference(last("delivered_high"))+difference(last("delivered_low"))) FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT difference(last("delivered_high"))*$hoogTarief+difference(last("delivered_low"))*$laagTarief FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT last("delivered_high") - first("delivered_high") + last("delivered_low") - first("delivered_low") FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT difference(last("delivered_high"))*$hoogTarief + difference(last("delivered_low"))*$laagTarief FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)
